it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller

Class BoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller.BoardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class BoardController
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements java.lang.Runnable, Observer
    Controller in charge of handling the game board.
    See Also:

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player player)
               throws FullBoardException,
                      PlayingBoardException,
                      EndedGameException
        Adds a new player to a board in LOBBY status or a returning player (who had previously disconnected) to a board where a game is in progress.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to be added.
        Throws:
        FullBoardException - thrown if the board already has 5 players.
        PlayingBoardException - thrown if the status of the board is not LOBBY (a game is already in progress or ended) and the player does not belong to that game.
        EndedGameException - thrown if this board hosts a game which has already ended.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(Player player)
                  throws InvalidPlayerException
        Removes a player from a board in LOBBY status or sets the player's status to DISCONNECTED if the game on that board is already in progress.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to be removed
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayerException - thrown if the player is invalid (e.g. not in the board)
